item.title: CSArch Lab members attended CSC 2024
item.description: CSArch Lab members attended KIISE Computer System Society Conference 2024 (CSC 2024) held in Pyeongchang, Gangwon-do. Our lab members had a great time as the great researchers on computer system research fields presented keynotes and their research work during the conference. Prof. Gunjae Koo served on the organizing committee for CSC 2024.

item.title: Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving on the external review committee for ISCA 2024
item.description: Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving as a member on the external review committee for the 51st International Symposium on Computer Architecture (ISCA 2024. ISCA 2024 will be held in in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Please submit your best work!

item.title: Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving on the program committee for HPCA 2024
item.description: Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving as a regular member on the program committee for the 30th IEEE International Symposium on High-Performance Computer Architecture (HPCA 2024. HPCA 2024 will be held in in Edinburgh, Scotland, UK. Please submit your best work!

item.title: Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving on the program committee for NVMSA 2023
item.description: Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving on the program committee for the 12th IEEE Non-Volatile Memory Systems and Applications Symposium (NVMSA 2023). NVMSA 2023 will be held on August 30–Septermber 1 in Niigata, Japan. Please submit your best work!

item.title: CSArch Lab members attended CSC 2023
item.description: CSArch Lab members attended KIISE Computer System Society Conference 2023 (CSC 2023) held in Pyeongchang, Gangwon-do. Our lab members had a great time as the great researchers on computer system research fields presented keynotes and their research work during the conference. Jonghyun and Boyoung presented their research work during the Student Poster Session. Prof. Gunjae Koo served on the organizing committee for CSC 2023.

item.title: Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving on the program committee for GPGPU 2023
item.description: Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving on the program committee for the 15th Workshop on the General Purpose Processing Using GPU (GPGPU 2023). GPGPU 2023 will be held in conjunction with HPCA 2023 in Montreal, QC, Canada. Please submit your best work!

item.title: Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving on the program committee for NVMSA 2022
item.description: Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving on the program committee for the 11th IEEE Non-Volatile Memory Systems and Applications Symposium (NVMSA 2022). NVMSA 2022 will be held on August 23–25 in Taipei, Taiwan. Please submit your best work!

item.title: CSArch Lab members attended CSC 2022
item.description: CSArch Lab members attended KIISE Computer System Society Conference 2022 (CSC 2022) held in Pyeongchang, Gangwon-do. Our lab members had a great time as the great researchers on computer system research fields presented keynotes and their research work during the conference. Prof. Gunjae Koo served on the organizing committee for CSC 2022. Our lab members also helped organizing the conference.

item.title: Boyoung and Hyunwoo attended LKC 2022
item.description: Boyoung and Hyunwoo attended Linux Kernel Camp 2022 (LKC 2022) to take lectures regarding memory management and file systems. They also explored memory management practices and file system implementations through the provided lab sessions. LKC 2022 provided great learning opportunities for those who work on computer system research. Prof. Gunjae Koo served on the organizing committee for LKC 2022.

item.title: Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving on the program committee for GPGPU 2022
item.description: Prof. Gunjae Koo will be serving on the program committee for the 14th Workshop on the General Purpose Processing Using GPU (GPGPU 2022). GPGPU 2022 will be held in conjunction with HPCA 2022 in Seoul, South Korea. Please submit your best work!
